verses.name: Isaiah 1:11
verses.text: To what purpose is the multitude of your sacrifices unto me? saith the Lord: I am full of the burnt offerings of rams, and the fat of fed beasts; and I delight not in the blood of bullocks, or of lambs, or of he goats.

verses.name: Isaiah 1:12
verses.text: When ye come to appear before me, who hath required this at your hand, to tread my courts?

verses.name: Isaiah 1:13
verses.text: Bring no more vain oblations; incense is an abomination unto me; the new moons and sabbaths, the calling of assemblies, I cannot away with; it is iniquity, even the solemn meeting.
